resources.string: Mifare DESFire EV3 Masterkey to DES NFCjLib
Change the Master Application Key from AES to DES

Changes the Master Application Key from (default) AES to (default) DES key. A default key is just filled up with 0x00 values - a DES key is 8 bytes and an AES key 16 bytes long. \n\n This happens IMMEDIATELY when a tag is tapped to the NFC reader without further confirmation ! The app will authenticate the Master Application with a default AES key.
WARNING: The app will IMMEDIATELY run the key change when attached without any further confirmation !
